articles.title: 科学的に証明された すごい習慣 第5回 「散らかったデスク」の社員の方が発揮できる能力とは? アインシュタインとピカソの“仕事部屋”の共通点

articles.title: Teaching LLMs to compose math symbolically, not execute it
articles.summary: Right now LLMs cannot be counted on to perfectly perform math. The solution I propose is to teach LLMs to instead of executing the math, just compose the mathematical equations correctly and leave the execution to a post-processing step.My core method would be: Use a single special token ᶜ (U+1D9C) before each element that needs computation, and then compute the result afterwards. For known math that doesn't need to be computed the ᶜ is not added or present.Thus we would see in the output:Normal
